about_the_game:
Take your Last Stand by defending your base against the invading Enemies!

Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to flip the cube in the direction you want. The cube can be flipped up, down, left, or right to destroy enemies by landing on them or blocking their path. You will need to navigate through obstacles using various strategies based on the current shape of your player.

You can only flip the cube(s) to a position not occupied by a block on the level.

This game was initially created for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2024 where it received a lot of positive feedback and out of 1,116 Game submissions it was ranked as #1 in the Mechanics category, #13 in Overall and #16 in the Fun category.

Features:
-Multiple game modes
-Increasing difficulty as you progress
-Leaderboards
-Multiple different player shapes

Crush your enemies to defend the base by rotating on to them


Be cautious of the shape as your player as you will require the appropriate space to rotate your object to navigate through the blocks
